item.title: Yellow fencing around traffic island obstructing view of oncoming traffic, 17th November
item.description:
The works have been there for weeks and the yellow fences around the pedestrian crossing are big! They jut out into the road making cars go round and when approaching from the Elmer's end direction, they block the view of oncoming traffic when turning right.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Elmers End Road, Upper Elmers End, London Borough of Bromley
